title: S13 Ep103: The Supernatural & Islam: Ghosts, Djinn & Possession
itunes:title: The Supernatural & Islam: Ghosts, Djinn & Possession
description:
Today BEYOND the DARKNESS gets educated on The Supernatural & Islam: Ghosts, Djinn & Possession with Isa Martell.

Isa Martell was raised Catholic surrounded by aspects of the the Supernatural and exposed to many Faiths. He converted to Islamic and and quickly became drawn into the spiritual side of the faith, exploring many facets of the unusual and even assisting in multiple exorcisms.
